summary: This mod contains 4 esp\'s to alter the speed of the katana weapns ingame.
descriptionHtml:
OK, so here we go again.  To all who downloaded the first files, my apologies, I have corrected the problem and reuploaded.  There are 4  esp\'s, that change the speed to 1.1, 1.2, 1.4, and one that changes the speed to 1.4 BUT reduces the damge by 3 points.  Different strokes, and all that.

Unzip and place ONE esp into your skyrim/data folder.
author: Bolivor

files.name: Speedier katanas
files.changelogHtml: Version 1.0 complete failure, files causing CTD. Files deleted, fixed, and reuploaded in one zip package.
